start.pokedex: I am the Pokedex and i will be your tool in your adventure.
start.how_to_use: How to use me? This is my commands:
start.help_commands: Try to use /help to see all commands.

settings.lang:
Change the language.

The language actual is

language.en: You are using now english language.
language.es: El español será el idioma por defecto.

command.pokemon:
/pokemon + name or ID - The pokemon to see.
Example: /pokemon pikachu
Example2: /pokemon 25
command.entry:
/entry + name or ID - The entry pokemon.
Example /entry bulbasaur
